name: Add new rows to Google Sheets for New Contacts in SmartEmailing
description: Every time a new contact is created in SmartEmailing, Make will automatically add that contact info to a new row in your Google Sheets. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gS3NS4-ToSstyFLTO6ZTfG9mT9QNlYk2ujFKLDZSEzQ/edit?usp=sharing)
